name: Sophia Nguyen
persona: Sophia Nguyen is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major who consistently excels in her coursework, maintaining a CGPA of 3.88. She is highly motivated to achieve top grades and demonstrates strong self-discipline in her studies. Sophia is confident in her academic abilities and perseveres through challenges, rarely letting setbacks deter her. While she occasionally feels some test anxiety, her dedication and organization help her manage stress effectively. Sophia is known among her peers for her reliability, determination, and passion for scientific discovery.
